name: On The Rocks
description:
On The Rocks is our Ludum Dare 42 submission (theme: "Running Out of Space").

Collect as much gold as possible by letting it pile onto your ship-- don't let any gold fall overboard, and reach as high a score as possible!

(If the game resolution is too big, use "CTRL + -" to reduce the resolution size.)

-----

Controls (Keyboard Only)

  • X Key - Drop off loot at the pier / Start game
  • Left Arrow Key - Move left
  • Right Arrow Key - Move right
  • R Key - Restart game

Game Jam Team

  • Robert "FlyingFlambe" Desrosiers - Code, Game Design, Production
  • Iván González "JeanSwamp" Lago - Art, Audio, Game Design

(*It's also Iván's first game jam, so feel free to send some love his way!)

Tools / Software

  • Unity2D (C#), Aseprite, Github
  • GameMaker: Studio, PyxelEdit
